text: Arman Mikaelyan (; born 25 November 1996) is an Armenian chess Grandmaster (2017). In 2013, Arman Mikaelyan won 2nd place in Armenian Junior Chess Championship in U18 age group and he ranked third in this tournament a year later. Arman Mikaelyan won silver medal in Armenian Chess Championship in 2015. In August 2019, he finished third in the Riga Technical University Open "A" tournament. In 2015, Arman Mikaelyan was awarded the FIDE International Master (IM) title and received the FIDE Grandmaster (GM) title two years later. ==References== ==External links== * *Arman Mikaelyan chess games at 365chess.com Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from Yerevan Category:Armenian chess players Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Living people
title: Arman Mikaelyan
